title: [LFP] Looking for duo of any rank to climb to Gold with

replies.body: Yeah i am up for it ! Im  bronze 4 and also looking for a duo partner. I get on League each weekday at 7.00-7.30 pm and play until 9.00 and on Saturdays im allowed on 8.30 to 11.00 am. Sunday its random. I can play any lane except Top lane.
Sounds good! Add me on league when you can and we'll go for some games when the opportunity is up. :)
